mn29:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate acirapakkante devadatte.
mn29:1.3: Tatra kho bhagavā devadattaṃ ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn29:2.1: “Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:2.2: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:2.3: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:2.4: So evaṃ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṃ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:2.5: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:2.6: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attānukkaṃseti paraṃ vambheti:
mn29:2.7: ‘ahamasmi lābhasakkārasilokavā, ime panaññe bhikkhū appaññātā appesakkhā’ti.
mn29:2.8: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena majjati pamajjati pamādaṃ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṃ viharati.
mn29:2.9: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṃ atikkamma phegguṃ atikkamma tacaṃ atikkamma papaṭikaṃ, sākhāpalāsaṃ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
mn29:2.10: Tamenaṃ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṃ vadeyya:
mn29:2.11: ‘na vatāyaṃ bhavaṃ puriso aññāsi sāraṃ, na aññāsi phegguṃ, na aññāsi tacaṃ, na aññāsi papaṭikaṃ, na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṃ.
mn29:2.12: Tathā hayaṃ bhavaṃ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṃ atikkamma phegguṃ atikkamma tacaṃ atikkamma papaṭikaṃ, sākhāpalāsaṃ chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti maññamāno.
mn29:2.13: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṃ tañcassa atthaṃ nānubhavissatī’ti.
mn29:2.14: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:2.15: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:2.16: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:2.17: So evaṃ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṃ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:2.18: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:2.19: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attānukkaṃseti, paraṃ vambheti ‘ahamasmi lābhasakkārasilokavā, ime panaññe bhikkhū appaññātā appesakkhā’ti.
mn29:2.20: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena majjati pamajjati pamādaṃ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṃ viharati.
mn29:2.21: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sākhāpalāsaṃ aggahesi brahmacariyassa;
mn29:3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:3.2: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:3.3: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:3.4: So evaṃ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṃ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:3.5: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:3.6: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:3.7: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati.
mn29:3.9: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:3.10: So tāya sīlasampadāya attānukkaṃseti, paraṃ vambheti:
mn29:3.11: ‘ahamasmi sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo, ime panaññe bhikkhū dussīlā pāpadhammā’ti.
mn29:3.12: So tāya sīlasampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādaṃ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṃ viharati.
mn29:3.13: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṃ atikkamma phegguṃ atikkamma tacaṃ, papaṭikaṃ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
mn29:3.14: Tamenaṃ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṃ vadeyya:
mn29:3.15: ‘na vatāyaṃ bhavaṃ puriso aññāsi sāraṃ, na aññāsi phegguṃ, na aññāsi tacaṃ, na aññāsi papaṭikaṃ, na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṃ.
mn29:3.16: Tathā hayaṃ bhavaṃ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṃ atikkamma phegguṃ atikkamma tacaṃ, papaṭikaṃ chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti maññamāno;
mn29:3.17: yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṃ tañcassa atthaṃ nānubhavissatī’ti.
mn29:4.1: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:4.2: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:4.3: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:4.4: So evaṃ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṃ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:4.5: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.6: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:4.7: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati.
mn29:4.9: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.10: So tāya sīlasampadāya attānukkaṃseti, paraṃ vambheti:
mn29:4.11: ‘ahamasmi sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo, ime panaññe bhikkhū dussīlā pāpadhammā’ti.
mn29:4.12: So tāya sīlasampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādaṃ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṃ viharati.
mn29:4.13: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu papaṭikaṃ aggahesi brahmacariyassa;
mn29:4.15: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:4.16: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:4.17: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:4.18: So evaṃ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṃ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:4.19: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.21: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:4.22: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:4.23: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.24: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:4.25: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati.
mn29:4.27: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.28: So tāya samādhisampadāya attānukkaṃseti, paraṃ vambheti:
mn29:4.29: ‘ahamasmi samāhito ekaggacitto, ime panaññe bhikkhū asamāhitā vibbhantacittā’ti.
mn29:4.30: So tāya samādhisampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādaṃ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṃ viharati.
mn29:4.31: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṃ atikkamma phegguṃ tacaṃ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
mn29:4.32: Tamenaṃ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṃ vadeyya ‘na vatāyaṃ bhavaṃ puriso aññāsi sāraṃ, na aññāsi phegguṃ, na aññāsi tacaṃ, na aññāsi papaṭikaṃ, na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṃ.
mn29:4.33: Tathā hayaṃ bhavaṃ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṃ atikkamma phegguṃ tacaṃ chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti maññamāno.
mn29:4.34: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṃ tañcassa atthaṃ nānubhavissatī’ti.
mn29:4.35: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:4.36: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:4.37: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:4.38: So evaṃ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṃ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:4.39: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.40: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:4.41: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:4.42: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.43: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:4.44: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:4.45: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.46: So tāya samādhisampadāya attānukkaṃseti, paraṃ vambheti:
mn29:4.47: ‘ahamasmi samāhito ekaggacitto, ime panaññe bhikkhū asamāhitā vibbhantacittā’ti.
mn29:4.48: So tāya samādhisampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādaṃ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṃ viharati.
mn29:4.49: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tacaṃ aggahesi brahmacariyassa;
mn29:5.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:5.2: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:5.3: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:5.4: So evaṃ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṃ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:5.5: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.6: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:5.7: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati.
mn29:5.9: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.10: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:5.11: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:5.12: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.13: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:5.14: So tāya samādhisampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:5.15: So tena ñāṇadassanena attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.16: So tena ñāṇadassanena attānukkaṃseti, paraṃ vambheti:
mn29:5.18: Ime panaññe bhikkhū ajānaṃ apassaṃ viharantī’ti.
mn29:5.19: So tena ñāṇadassanena majjati pamajjati pamādaṃ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṃ viharati.
mn29:5.20: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṃ phegguṃ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
mn29:5.21: Tamenaṃ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṃ vadeyya:
mn29:5.22: ‘na vatāyaṃ bhavaṃ puriso aññāsi sāraṃ na aññāsi phegguṃ na aññāsi tacaṃ na aññāsi papaṭikaṃ na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṃ.
mn29:5.23: Tathā hayaṃ bhavaṃ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṃ phegguṃ chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti maññamāno.
mn29:5.24: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṃ tañcassa atthaṃ nānubhavissatī’ti.
mn29:5.25: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:5.26: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:5.27: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:5.28: So evaṃ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṃ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:5.29: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.31: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:5.32: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:5.33: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.34: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:5.35: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:5.36: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.37: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:5.38: So tāya samādhisampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:5.39: So tena ñāṇadassanena attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.41: So tena ñāṇadassanena attānukkaṃseti, paraṃ vambheti:
mn29:5.42: ‘ahamasmi jānaṃ passaṃ viharāmi, ime panaññe bhikkhū ajānaṃ apassaṃ viharantī’ti.
mn29:5.43: So tena ñāṇadassanena majjati pamajjati pamādaṃ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṃ viharati.
mn29:5.44: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu phegguṃ aggahesi brahmacariyassa;
mn29:6.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:6.2: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:6.3: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:6.4: So evaṃ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṃ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:6.5: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti, na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.6: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:6.7: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:6.8: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.9: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:6.10: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:6.11: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.12: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:6.13: So tāya samādhisampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:6.14: So tena ñāṇadassanena attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.15: So tena ñāṇadassanena na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:6.16: So tena ñāṇadassanena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno asamayavimokkhaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:6.17: Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ so bhikkhu tāya asamayavimuttiyā parihāyetha.
mn29:6.18: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato sāraññeva chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti jānamāno.
mn29:6.19: Tamenaṃ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṃ vadeyya:
mn29:6.20: ‘aññāsi vatāyaṃ bhavaṃ puriso sāraṃ, aññāsi phegguṃ, aññāsi tacaṃ, aññāsi papaṭikaṃ, aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṃ.
mn29:6.21: Tathā hayaṃ bhavaṃ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato sāraññeva chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti jānamāno.
mn29:6.22: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṃ tañcassa atthaṃ anubhavissatī’ti.
mn29:6.23: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:6.24: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:6.25: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:6.26: So evaṃ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṃ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:6.27: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti, na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.28: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:6.29: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:6.30: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.31: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:6.32: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:6.33: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.34: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:6.35: So tāya samādhisampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:6.36: So tena ñāṇadassanena attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.37: So tena ñāṇadassanena na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:6.38: So tena ñāṇadassanena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno asamayavimokkhaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:6.39: Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ so bhikkhu tāya asamayavimuttiyā parihāyetha.
mn29:7.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, nayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ lābhasakkārasilokānisaṃsaṃ, na sīlasampadānisaṃsaṃ, na samādhisampadānisaṃsaṃ, na ñāṇadassanānisaṃsaṃ.
mn29:7.2: Yā ca kho ayaṃ, bhikkhave, akuppā cetovimutti—
mn29:7.3: etadatthamidaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ, etaṃ sāraṃ etaṃ pariyosānan”ti.
mn29:7.5: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
